definition: abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: It was not a statutory company but a de facto form initially.
sentences.chinese: 它最初是以一種事實上的而非法定的公司形態出現的。

sentences.english: The above is applicable for both statutory and other non-statutory.
sentences.chinese: 以上是適用於雙方的法定及其他非法定。

sentences.english: The author proposed that the crime of illegal medical practice is also an non-statutory offence to intent.
sentences.chinese: 分析了非法行醫罪也是一種非法定目的犯。

sentences.english: The yardstick to distinguish informal intent crime should be the infringement of the legal interest.
sentences.chinese: 法益侵害則是劃定非法定目的犯的基本標準。

sentences.english: Allowance is made in this Pharmacopeia for the detection of foreign substances by unofficial methods.
sentences.chinese: 該藥典中允許通過非法定的方法檢測外來物質。

sentences.english: At the very beginning, it emerges as the form of actual non-legal company.
sentences.chinese: 它最初是以事實上的而非法定的公司形態出現的。

definition: provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
to infer/to consider and come to a judgment/to recommend/to estimate/deduced to be
according to provisions/as stipulated in the rules
